items.sentence: Tom had never imagined that Mary would react this way.
I don\'t think I\'ll be able to fix your broken phone.
I doubt that Tom would ever consider leaving his wife.
Don\'t blame yourselves. You did everything you could.
Don\'t just show up at my place without calling first.
Don\'t take yourselves so seriously. No one else does.
I\'m pretty sure that they won\'t allow us to do that.
I\'m sure I won\'t be as busy tomorrow as I was today.
T-shirts and jeans are not suitable for this occasion.
Why didn\'t the band play the song that you requested?
Tom is worried about what might have happened to Mary.
Tom planted some flowers in the garden this afternoon.
I suspect that Tom and Mary do that from time to time.
Tom turned to the bartender and ordered another drink.
Tom wanted to get as far away from Boston as he could.
Tom was arrested and charged with first degree murder.
Tom was spoiled by his parents, especially his mother.
He returned back home after being away for ten months.
How did they manage to keep this a secret for so long?
Tom is the only person who really knows what happened.
I told Tom to go to the safest place I could think of.
I think that I\'m going to ask Tom to stop doing that.
Tom doesn\'t seem to be as stupid as Mary seems to be.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary knows it was him who did that.
I can\'t talk with my father without losing my temper.
Tom heard a couple of people talking in the next room.
We went to Boston to spend a couple of weeks with Tom.
Tom plays poker with his friends every Monday evening.
Tom prefers the company of cats and books over people.
Why didn\'t you tell Tom the same thing you told Mary?
Tom isn\'t very likely to find what he\'s looking for.
Unfavorable circumstances prevented me from traveling.
How can someone know if they\'re a good singer or not?
I think Tom and Mary are the ones who stole my wallet.
I think it would be better if Tom stayed here with us.
Tom has already been told to be here tomorrow at 2:30.
Tom heard some noise, but he wasn\'t sure what it was.
I know you don\'t want to hear what I\'m about to say.
I have a daughter that goes to the same school as Tom.
I have no idea why Tom wanted Mary to stop doing that.
There\'s not much difference between the two opinions.
I heard that Tom came back to Australia for Christmas.
What\'s your favorite recording of Beethoven\'s Fifth?
Tom didn\'t tell us that he\'d be in Boston this week.
You should chain the dog up, so he won\'t bite anyone.
Mary was wearing a blue dress the last time I saw her.
Could you tell Tom why you don\'t want him to do that?
Tom is very likely to be very tired when he gets here.
Tom wasn\'t amused by what was going on, but Mary was.
I thought that you said you wanted to do that for Tom.
